Database Reset Script
======================

This script is used to reinitialize the database by dropping all existing tables and recreating them based on the current models.

Caution:
--------
- This script deletes all existing data in the database. Use it only when a reset is required.

How It Works:
--------------
.. automodule:: .init_db
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
